note: Paid work or study includes activities such as: paid work (all jobs); travel to and from work or study;  time in school or classes; research/homework; job search; other paid work or study-related.
title: Time spent on paid work or study, per day, men vs women
subtitle: Average minutes spent on paid work or study, per day, by sex (ages 15-65). Estimates come from time-use surveys and include both weekdays and weekends. The survey years differ across countries. See the source description for the survey year used for each country.

display.name: Minutes spent on paid work or study - women (15-65)
Minutes spent on paid work or study - men (15-65)
